name: Drill-O-Naut
response: Drill-O-Naut is the ultimate resource hog, a greasy goblin of extraction with a single mission: drill, baby, drill! This towering, beady-eyed fiend sees the world as one big ATM—full of black gold to be pumped dry. To him, the land is just a fossil-fuel-filled piñata waiting for his pickaxe. Great fires and smoggy skies? Just collateral damage—Drill-O-Naut doesn’t care; he’s too busy fueling his addiction to extraction! Insurance? Pharma? Crypto? Yawn. These are distant noises, like the hum of a far-off generator or the sound of someone else’s problems. Drill-O-Naut shrugs, scratches his rusted chin, and keeps on drilling. His motto? “Flow, baby, flow!”—and that’s all that matters to this oil-soaked oddball.
